sentences.cn: 一个能装很多东西的手提箱

sentences.en: After their labours of Hercules , they have recently published the voluminous dictionary with the Commercial Press.
sentences.cn: 经过异常艰巨的劳动, 他们最近在商务印书馆出版了那部大部头词典.

sentences.en: And this great novel has received voluminous comments and interpretations diverged greatly since it was published.
sentences.cn: 它自从问世以来就收到了不计其数的而且观点截然不同的各种评论和诠释.

sentences.en: But again , too voluminous an outflow can erode the diversionchannel and cause the dam to collapse.
sentences.cn: 但太多的流出量也会毁掉引水渠,引起水坝溃堤.

sentences.en: Faults: Abdomen ( belly ) too tucked up ( as in a greyhound ) or drooping ( voluminous ).
sentences.cn: 缺点: 腹部收起过度 ( 象格力犬 ) 或者下垂.

sentences.en: He took voluminous notes during the lecture.
sentences.cn: 他在听课时作了大量笔记。
他的知识是极其渊博的.

sentences.en: I sank down into a voluminous armchair.
sentences.cn: 我一下子坐在了宽大的扶手椅里。

sentences.en: In a series of online opinionsurveys and in voluminous press commentary, debate has been surprisingly intense.
sentences.cn: 一系列的在线调查和大量的新闻报道显示, 争议惊人地剧烈.

sentences.en: Iron and aluminum compounds precipitate as a voluminous sludge.
sentences.cn: 铁和铝的化合物成为一种体积庞大的蓬松的游渣沉淀下来.

sentences.en: She tucked up her voluminous skirts to make room for Jane beside her.
sentences.cn: 她掖起膨松的裙边给旁边的简腾出地方.

sentences.en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentences.en: The importance of the subject is suggested by a voluminous literature.
sentences.cn: 很多文献提到了这个问题的重要性.

sentences.en: The sleeves on the'Geisha Rose'print blouse are voluminous and bell - shaped.
sentences.cn: 艺伎玫瑰'的衬衫袖子上面有大量的钟形印花.

sentences.en: Voluminous facts indicate that the essence of this report is fan anti - China feeling and undermine - US relations.
sentences.cn: 大量的事实表明,这份报告的实质是煽动 反 华情绪,破坏中美关系.

trans.tran_cn: 大的，多卷的，著作多的，宽松的
trans.tran_en: voluminous books, documents etc are very long and contain a lot of detail
